data.title: Privacy Policy
data.content:
Privacy Policy

We respect your privacy and promise to never share, trade, sell, deliver, reveal, publicize, or market your email address in any way, shape, or form.

Opus web site collects no personally identifying information about individuals except when specifically and knowingly provided by such individuals. In addition, Opus Virtual Offices site may place a “cookie” in the browser files of a user’s computer. The cookie itself does not contain any personally identifying information although it will enable the site to relate a user’s use of the site to information that the user has specifically and knowingly provided to Opus Virtual Offices.

Opus Virtual Office, may also use such information for marketing and promotional purposes.

For more information refer to our Terms of Use page.

Opus Virtual Offices is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. As part of our operations, the Opus VO app requires access to your contact list. This access enables you to easily place calls to your existing contact. We assure you that the app accesses your contact list solely for this purpose and does not share this information with any third parties without your explicit consent.

We take your privacy seriously and have implemented robust security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. By using Opus VO, you consent to the use of your contact list information as described in this privacy statement. We encourage you to review this statement regularly to stay informed about how we are protecting your information. If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please do not hesitate to contact us.
